titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LABOUR OR DELIVERY ONSET METHOD CODE - Description

div.p: LABOUR OR DELIVERY ONSET METHOD CODE is the same asÂ attribute LABOUR OR DELIVERY ONSET METHOD.

Only those methods that are used to induce Labour, such as surgical induction, medical induction or a combination of the two, should be recorded. Methods that are used to accelerate Labour should not be recorded.
For specific National Code usage, see LABOUR OR DELIVERY ONSET METHOD.
